question:
Which of the following are the outcomes of the COP 16 Cancun summit?
1) Technology mechanism
2) Green climate fund
3) Adaptation fund
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The 16th C. O. P. was held at Cancun which is a city in southeast Mexico. The following are the outcomes of the COP 16 Cancun summit:
1) Technology mechanism
2) Green climate fund
3) Adaptation fund
